title: i cant open league (error to reinstall)
body:
i try to open league but it keeps on not responding.
I delete and reinstalled it but it came up with an error.
It wont even show the league sign.
please help 
i clicked on the shortcut but it will not open the application.
please help me riot games

replies.body:
Hey S9087,

Can you go through the steps in the [Reinstalling League of Legends](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends) support article, and let me know if that works? 

Otherwise, can you provide a screenshot of the error you're encountering while re-installing the client?

Thanks!
I also have this issue too, I had already try to unintall and reinstall the game, but still nothing shows up. I am using Win10, ve been able to play no problem at all before this shows up.
